Token.Abstract: An encapsulation for all Virtuoso SDK configuration settings.

Amount of time, in seconds, between when Virtuoso finishes downloading an asset and when it deletes that downloaded asset.
Amount of time, in seconds, between when Virtuoso finishes downloading an asset and when it deletes that downloaded asset.
Amount of time, in seconds, between when Virtuoso finishes downloading an asset and when it deletes that downloaded asset.

Returns the headroom configuration value.

Returns the headroom configuration value.
Allows you to override the default value for the headroom setting.

Parameter.Name: newHeadroom
Parameter.Abstract: The new headroom setting Virtuoso should use (in MB)

Token.Abstract: Resets Virtuoso's headroom setting to the default (1 GB)
Returns the max storage configuration value, in MB.
Returns the max storage configuration value, in MB.
Returns the max storage configuration value, in MB.
Allows you to override the default value for max storage.

Parameter.Name: maxStorageAllowed
Parameter.Abstract: The new max storage value (in MB).

Token.Abstract: Resets Virtuoso's maximum storage to the default (5 GB)
Returns the cellular download permission value.
Returns the cellular download permission value.
Returns the cellular download permission value.
Allows you to override Virtuoso's default value for the cellular download permission setting.
Reset Virtuoso's cellular download setting to the default (false)
Whether or not the engine stops downloading if an error occurs while downloading individual segments.
Whether or not the engine stops downloading if an error occurs while downloading individual segments.
Whether or not the engine stops downloading if an error occurs while downloading individual segments.
The network connection timeout for Virtuoso HTTP requests, in seconds. Default is 60.0s.
The network connection timeout for Virtuoso HTTP requests, in seconds. Default is 60.0s.
The network connection timeout for Virtuoso HTTP requests, in seconds. Default is 60.0s.

A dictionary of additional HTTP headers that Virtuoso will send (along with the default set of HTTP headers) in every HTTP request. Takes precedence over the default HTTP headers. These headers may also be overridden by additionalNetworkHeaders specified on the VirtuosoAsset individually.
Example: engine.additionalNetworkHeaders = @{"AccessKey":"<UUID>"};

A dictionary of additional HTTP headers that Virtuoso will send (along with the default set of HTTP headers) in every HTTP request. Takes precedence over the default HTTP headers. These headers may also be overridden by additionalNetworkHeaders specified on the VirtuosoAsset individually.
Example: engine.additionalNetworkHeaders = @{"AccessKey":"<UUID>"};

A dictionary of additional HTTP headers that Virtuoso will send (along with the default set of HTTP headers) in every HTTP request. Takes precedence over the default HTTP headers. These headers may also be overridden by additionalNetworkHeaders specified on the VirtuosoAsset individually.
Example: engine.additionalNetworkHeaders = @{"AccessKey":"<UUID>"};
Enables Penthera's StreamPackager service for background download of segmented VirtuosoAssets (HLS, HSS, DASH, etc).
Enables Penthera's StreamPackager service for background download of segmented VirtuosoAssets (HLS, HSS, DASH, etc).
Enables Penthera's StreamPackager service for background download of segmented VirtuosoAssets (HLS, HSS, DASH, etc).

Token.Abstract: Configures additional MIME types for asset manifest and segment file validation

Parameter.Name: additionalMimeTypes
